metadata.title: CVE-2024-11695 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: A crafted URL containing Arabic script and whitespace characters could havehidden the true origin of the page, resulting in a potential spoofingattack. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 133, Firefox ESR < 128.5,Thunderbird < 133, and Thunderbird < 128.5.

criterions.comment: mozjs115: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
